About Me

My Introduction

Hi! I'm Mitty, an Industrial Engineer with a passion and expertise in software development and data science. As an IE with a coding superpower, I tackle problems from a fresh perspective.
In my free time, I like discovering new tech, developing small projects, enjoying art, and figuring out my life.

Portfolio

Most recent work

AnyLogic warehouse simulation

Built a warehouse simulation to drive data-driven decisions and predict future resource needs. It functions as a digital twin, optimizing future project planning and forecasting.

Image for illustrative purposes only, actual model is proprietary.

Defect classification with ML and DL

Built a defect classification pipeline using Machine learning, Computer vision, dimension reduction tools, and feature engineering, to filter out the false alarms and enable a more efficient class type labeling process.

3D print and productionize screw counting tray

Designed, prototyped, and productionized a 3D-printed tray that addressed picking bottlenecks, boosting small part counting efficiency by an impressive 80% and earning widespread adoption in the warehouse.

Pet groomer full stack app dev

A personal passion project where I collaborated with Gemini to design and develop a full-stack application from conception to deployment, streamlining the process for users to easily find mobile pet groomers.
